summary:
## Gamma Function

The gamma function (Î“) is a math tool that extends the idea of factorials (multiplying numbers together) to include fractions and negative numbers. It's defined using a special integral formula for complex numbers.

Although it has poles (points where it's undefined) at zero and negative integers, the gamma function has no zeros, making its reciprocal a useful "whole" function. The gamma function is important in many areas of math and statistics.
title: Gamma function
